item.title: 索尼生活考虑出售日本债券以避免减记损失
item.description: 索尼人寿保险公司将采取措施，包括出售其持有的政府债券，以避免在国内利率持续上升的情况下出现减值。【原文：Sony Life Insurance will take measures, including the sale of government bonds it holds, to avoid writedowns in the event domestic interest rates keep rising.】

item.title: 新加坡 2025 年开局强劲，但仍面临下行风险
item.description: 由于企业急于避免美国征收更高的关税，新加坡经济在 2025 年以快于预期的速度启动，制造业和出口活动蓬勃发展。【原文：Singapore’s economy kick-started 2025 on a faster-than-expected note, enjoying a flurry of manufacturing and export activity as businesses rushed to avoid the imposition of higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 力拓寻求将昆士兰矿山的铝土矿产量提高近一倍
item.description: 力拓集团正在开展早期工作和最终研究，力争到 2029 年将其位于昆士兰州最北部的 Amrun 项目的铝土矿产量提高近一倍。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is conducting early works and final studies to potentially almost double bauxite production from its Amrun project in far north Queensland by 2029.】

item.title: 瑞安-雷诺兹的广告公司 MNTN 和控股公司在首次公开募股中筹资 1.87 亿美元
item.description: 互联电视广告平台 MNTN 公司及其部分股东在首次公开募股中筹集了 1.87 亿美元，发行价为市场定价区间的最高价。【原文：Connected TV advertising platform MNTN Inc. and some of its shareholders raised $187 million in an initial public offering priced at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国库存增加加剧供应过剩担忧，石油跌幅扩大

item.title: 卡尼称加拿大和美国正在就金穹顶防御系统进行 "高级别 "会谈

item.description: 美国财政部发表声明称，美国国务卿斯科特-贝森特和日本财务大臣加藤胜信在加拿大会晤期间没有讨论外汇水平问题。这一消息导致日元走低。【原文：US Secretary Scott Bessent and Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato did not discuss foreign exchange levels during a meeting in Canada, according to a statement from the Treasury Department. item.description: Zoom Communications Inc. 公布的来自企业客户的收入超过了分析师的预期，这表明其扩大后的产品套件销售强劲。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. reported revenue from enterprise customers that topped analysts’ estimates, suggesting stronger sales among its expanded suite of products.】

item.title: Hinge Health、MNTN IPO 测试美国上市反弹力度
item.description: 数字医疗和广告技术行业在首次公开募股（IPO）方面都有过令人失望的经历，这使得本周计划首次公开募股的理疗平台 Hinge Health Inc.和电视广告软件公司 MNTN Inc.【原文：The digital-health and advertising-technology sectors share a rich history of IPO disappointment, making this week’s planned debuts of physical therapy platform Hinge Health Inc. and TV ad software firm MNTN Inc. a test of whether the nascent recovery in the US first-time share sale market can keep going.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 首席执行官在任职 25 年后卸任主席一职
item.description: MercadoLibre 首席执行官马科斯-加尔佩林（Marcos Galperin）将成为这家电子商务和金融技术巨头的执行董事长，这标志着自他二十多年前创立这家拉丁美洲最有价值的公司以来，其最高职位首次发生变动。【原文：MercadoLibre Chief Executive Officer Marcos Galperin will become executive chairman of the e-commerce and financial technology giant, marking the first change in the top job since he founded Latin America’s most valuable company more than two decades ago.】

item.title: HPS 为 Consumer Cellular 主导超过 30 亿美元的私人债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 HPS Investment Partners 为首的一批私人信贷公司向 Consumer Cellular 公司提供了 30 多亿美元的债务，用于为其广泛的银团贷款再融资，并向其私人股本所有者 GTCR 支付股息。【原文：A group of private credit firms led by HPS Investment Partners provided more than $3 billion of debt to Consumer Cellular Inc. to refinance its broadly syndicated loans and pay a dividend to its private equity owner GTCR, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
